content: sew tentacle to body sew 8 tentacles to bottom of body evenly spaced around round 6 i like to center the first one between the eyes sew last two tentacles in the middle of the body bottom finish off ends placement of first 8 tentacles placement of last 2 tentacles © 2019 the fidghty flower llc all rights reserved www thefidgetyflower com jellyfish 6 this pattern can be found along with nine others in the book crocheted sea animals 10 sea creatures designed specifically for blanket yarn by sarah quillen the book is available from amazon you can find more individual animal patterns for blanket yarn at www thefidgetyflower com we can also be contacted at info@thefidgetyflower com every effort has been made to ensure that this pattern is accurate and complete the fidgety flower llc is not responsible for variations to the original pattern typographical mistakes and human error ©2018 the fidgety flower llc all rights reserved reproductions and/or distribution of this publication is prohibited unless specifically authorized by the fidgety flower to do so this limitation includes but is not limited to any form of reproduction physically or digitally including through the internet including scanning emailing and posting in any form © 2019 the fidghty flower llc all rights reserved www thefidgetyflower com jellyfish 7
